description: Patterns are git repos, with working, deployable example code which solves a well described problem
file: new?title=<proposed pattern title goes here>&body=Please include details:%0A%0A- [ ] a link to source code, if it exists%0A%0A- [ ] if no code exists, will the submitter produce the code?%0A%0A- [ ] Why is the pattern a good idea?

description: Blog posts are pearls of tech wisdom, published on the IBM Code Blog
How tos are shorter step by step solution guides
Tech talks are 30 minute presentations, scheduled and broadcast over the web
Workshops are deeper, multi-hour, or multi-day sessions that aim to instill a level of expertise in a subject
